Texts.Eng: Hi there! I'm working on a prototype piece of armour that emits a freezing gas at all times, but I need some more materials for my research. The ice here is good, but I need something stronger: ^orange;Cryonic Extract^reset;. You look like an adventurer: ^green;could you find some for me^reset;? You'll get to keep the armour if you do!

Wonderful, this is just what I needed! With this much cryonic extract, the freezing gas should be potent enough to freeze almost anything! Take the armour with you, and make sure to give it a try. I think you'll like it!
